meta.title: create django model
meta.description: Convert a model description to a django python model file

Input_data.description: Standard diagram or text that explain relations and attributes in the model, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unified_Modeling_Language
the ouput must work under this code version

Output_data.description: Models django python file, more details here https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.1/topics/db/models/
Output_data.QA: python makemigration; python migrate do not show errors
